FMP_ACCESS_TOKEN.title: FMP Access Token
FMP_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Financial Modeling Prep API access token

FMP_TOOL_SETS.title: Tool Sets (Optional)
FMP_TOOL_SETS.description: Comma-separated list of tool sets to load (e.g., 'search,company,quotes'). If not specified, all tools will be loaded.

DYNAMIC_TOOL_DISCOVERY.title: Dynamic Tool Discovery (Optional)
DYNAMIC_TOOL_DISCOVERY.description: Enable dynamic toolset management. Set to 'true' to use meta-tools.
